ValidationRule.description: Active field and End Date field should be limited and depended on Status values
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( $User.ProfileId != "00e30000000bvR3", /*System Administrator*/ ISPICKVAL(Status , "Planned"), EndDate <= TODAY() ), AND( $User.ProfileId != "00e30000000bvR3", /*System Administrator*/ OR( ISPICKVAL(Status , "Approved"), ISPICKVAL(Status , "In Progress") ), OR( ISBLANK(EndDate), EndDate <= TODAY() ) ), AND( $User.ProfileId != "00e30000000bvR3", /*System Administrator*/ ISPICKVAL(Status , "Completed"), ISBLANK(EndDate) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Campaign End Date should not be NULL for Campaign Status = 'Approved' OR 'In Progress' OR 'Completed' OR should not be a past date for Campaign Status = 'Planned' OR 'Approved' OR 'In Progress' status.
